title: Completed PE Summary - Audacious
raw_html:
Category Fishing
Registered Owner & Manager: AK & DM Morrison Ltd
Port of registry: Stornoway
Flag: UK
Type: Fishing vessel
Built: 1976
Construction: Wood
Length overall: 16.89
Gross tonnage: 24.77
Date & Time 19/12/04 06:26
Location of incident: Scotish Coastal waters
Incident Type: Grounding
Persons onboard: 3 crew
Injuries/ fatalities: 1 fatality
Damage Ship lost

Synopsis

The 16m wooden fishing vessel Audacious ran aground on Arnish Point and sank at about 0625 on 19 December 2004. Two of the three crew were able to swim to shore and were subsequently rescued, but the skipper drowned.

Action taken:

No specific recommendations were made as a result of this PE.
